description: Learn how to make a flavoursome satay sauce with only a few pantry staples. It's perfect as a dipping sauce or spooned over chicken skewers.
name: Easy Satay Sauce Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place peanut butter, soy, vinegar, milk, paste, sugar and 1/2 cup water in a small saucepan. Bring to a simmer, stirring, over medium heat. Simmer for 3 minutes or until slightly thickened. If sauce is too thick, adjust consistency with a little water.
Transfer sauce to a serving dish and sprinkle with peanuts. Serve with chicken skewers, snow peas and celery.
